Tensor Property¶

class TensorProperty.TensorProperty(points, tensors=None)[source]¶

Attributes

Points Holds the points dataset
Raster Holds raster dataset
Size Return the size of the property

Methods

GetAllPointsTensors() Retrieve all points tensors
getTensor(idx) Retrieve a tensor of point(s) with idx index
getValues() Get a specific characteristic value of the property
save(filename, **kwargs) Save the property in either json or hdf5.
setValues(idx, tensor) Sets the tensor for an index
GetAllPointsTensors()[source]¶

Retrieve all points tensors

Return type: np.array
getTensor(idx)[source]¶

Retrieve a tensor of point(s) with idx index

Parameters: idx (int) – the index of the point
Returns: the tensor of point idx
Return type: Tensor
setValues(idx, tensor)[source]¶

Sets the tensor for an index

Parameters:
  • idx (int) – the index to which the tensor should be updated
  • tensor (Tensor) – the computed tensor
